byline.contributor: Reuben Kyama contributed reporting from Nairobi, Kenya.

abstract: Bodies of Willie Kimani, Joseph Muiruri and Josephat Mwenda are found dumped in Ol Donyo Sabuk River outside of Nairobi, Kenya; men, one of whom was well-connected professional, were last seen at police station and were all involved in police harassment case.
lead_paragraph: The bodies of a lawyer, his last known client and a taxi driver were discovered after their disappearance last week unsettled human rights activists.

headline.main: 3 Kenyans Last Seen at Police Station Are Found Dead
headline.print_headline: Kenyans’ Deaths Raise Fears of Police Tactics

snippet: The bodies of a lawyer, his last known client and a taxi driver were discovered after their disappearance last week unsettled human rights activists....

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
